name: nodejs-metrics-tryout
description: Consists of a sample project using a Node.js/Express service that exposes data with [express-prom-bundle](https://github.com/jochen-schweizer/express-prom-bundle) (built on top of [prom-client](https://github.com/siimon/prom-client)). It also contains a **docker-compose** üêã file that deploys two other containers - a Prometheus server and a Grafana server -, so we can collect the service data and use it to generate dashboards and graphs.
author: felipet-vsouza
